content: {"locationId": "6656", "organizationId": "5648", "name": "First United Methodist - Shiner", "address1": "102 W Church St", "address2": "", "city": "Shiner", "state": "TX", "zipCode": "77984", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "29.421372", "longitude": "-97.1627384", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Lavaca", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Enter in on the North end of the building.  Building is open at 7:30am for a time of coffee and fellowship.  A light breakfast is served beginning at 8:45am and food is handed out in order of arrival of clients promptly at 9am.", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "361-594-3830", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 49, "regionName": "Food Bank of the Golden Crescent", "logoBlobNameSmall": "285914fc-5ff8-4345-9007-442c69c1037d.png", "website": "https://www.tfbgc.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Thursday 9:00 AM-11:00 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
